      • verifyTags

        protected static boolean verifyTags(Item item,
                                    java.lang.String tag,
                                    NBTTagType nbtType,
                                    boolean setTags)
        Verifies the NBTTags of the Item are as expected
        Parameters:
        item - the Item to verify tags for
        tag - the name given to the tag
        nbtType - the expected NBTTagType
        setTags - whether to automatically generate missing tags
        Returns:
        true if good; false if not
